content-descriptors.description: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
content-descriptors.name: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

attributes.long-description:
Download Mortal Kombat vs. DC Universe today. When Worlds collide, Heroes and Villains must choose their side and fight as a sinister plot with cataclysmic results unfolds. Which side will you choose?

As of May 31, 2014 online matchmaking will no longer function for Mortal Kombat vs. DC Universe due to Gamespy removing its online infrastructure and support for a number of titles. WB Games evaluated a large number of migration solutions, including extensive discussions with the engineering team at NetherRealm Studios. Due to the complexities of supporting the game’s older networking framework, there was no feasible way to integrate a new network layer. This was a very difficult realization for us given the passion we have for the game.

Please also note that it might not be possible to obtain all the trophies once the online functionality has been shut down. If you have further questions about the shutdown of these services, please visit http://support.wbgames.com

This item is being licensed or sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America and is subject to the Network Terms of Service and User Agreement, this item’s use restrictions and other applicable terms located at www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not download this item.

Mortal Kombat software © 2011 Warner Bros. Entertainment Inc. Developed by NetherRealm Studios. All other trademarks and copyrights are the property of their respective owners. All rights reserved.

Mortal Kombat, the dragon logo, NetherRealm Studios, NetherRealm Studios logo and all related characters and elements are trademarks of and © Warner Bros. Entertainment Inc.
